name: Chinatown Hearing Center
address: 196 Canal St 4th floor, New York, NY 10013
description: A private audiology practice founded by Alex Liang and Dr. Jenny He, fluent in Cantonese, Mandarin, and Taishanese, serving the Chinese community with a focus on hearing loss awareness and patient care

name: New York Audiology PLLC

name: New York Hearing Center

description: Founded by Dr. Kathy Feng, who is fluent in English and Chinese, this center serves a diverse clientele and aims to help individuals with hearing loss avoid social isolation

name: Landa Hearing Center
